name: Think
text: Beautiful location and rooms, exceptional staff, delicious food. Lots of great details in the room. It is a mid-range place... If you are used to roughing it, this will be a step up and if you are used to 4 star hotels, this will be a bit rough. Entry to the museum is an extra 20dh and is well worth your time.

name: Fu
text: Nice stop on my cycling trip around Morocco.A great place to explore，excellent reception. Recommend！

name: Saket
text: Built in an old building , was very nice. The village and covered alleys were great

name: Ag
text: Staying at this place felt like you went back in time but it still had all the modern conveniences . The staff was very friendly and helpful. Food and hospitality was very good. They have a big breakfast and great coffee.

name: Davide
text: Staff super helpful and friendly! Amazing place to discover

name: Punkaker
text: Sleeping inside a restored Kasbah was great! The place is very charming and the room was big and confortable. The facilities are excelent: terrace, garden, restaurants, information point, maps,... They are very prepared to receive guests. It is not a touristic place so the place was calm and relaxing. Very friendly staff.

name: Jonathan
text: Great place! Clean,comfy, good food. Loved it.

name: Nikola
text: Very good breakfast - all u can eat Swimming pool Located in typical morrocan kasbah

name: Annet
text: A very spacious room in an authentic kasbah. Staff was very friendly and helpful.

name: Zoë
text: Really special accommodation, you feel like you are living in the kasbah for one day just like the Berber families still do! Big rooms with comfortable bed and clean bathroom.
